name: FIFA 96 Soccer
overview: The mother of all soccer games is back! The World's #1 soccer game just got better with faster gameplay, new visual effects and more features. All NEW offensive weapons - Sprint dribbles, realistic player fakes, passing arrows, give and gas - SMARTER and FASTER Player and Goalie Intelligence - Over 3800 Superstars from 237 Teams in 12 International Leagues - All NEW PRO MODE for Expert Players - Full League, Playoff, and Tournament Modes - Features JOHN MOTSON, the Voice of International Soccer
